name: 吳昭正
objective:
1.影像處理教學基礎
2.影像輸出入系統
3.點處理運算
4.範圍影像處理
5.頻域影像處理
6.影像幾何轉換
7.影像編碼
8.影像分析
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Basic Matlab operations (I)
Week 3. Basic Matlab operations (II)
Week 4. Image transformations in Matlab (I)
Week 5. Image transformations in Matlab (II)
Week 6. Digital image fundamentals
Week 7. Image enhancement in spatial domain (I)
Week 8. Image enhancement in spatial domain (II)
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. Image enhancement in frequency domain (I)
Week 11. Image enhancement in frequency domain (II)
Week 12. Color Image Processing (I)
Week 13. Color Image Processing (II)
Week 14. Image Segmentation (I)
Week 15. Image Segmentation (II)
Week 16. Morphological Image Processing (I)
Week 17. Morphological Image Processing (II)
Week 18. Final Exam
materials: Textbook: Digital Image Processing, 2nd Edition, by Rafael C. Gonzalez & Richard E. Woods, Prentice Hall, 2002
